Interface Query<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    PreparedQuery<T>

    public interface Query<T>
    A query.
    Author:
    Julien Viet

    • Method Summary

      <R> Query<SqlResult<R>> collecting(java.util.stream.Collector<Row,?,R> collector)
